articles.author: Shola Lawal
articles.title: Does India risk US sanctions over Iran’s Chabahar Port deal? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The port deal could help India strengthen trade ties with Central Asia. But a US sanctions threat clouds the pact.
articles.content: India has signed a 10-year agreement to develop and operate Irans strategic Chabahar Port as New Delhi aims to boost trade ties with landlocked Afghanistan and Central Asian countries, bypassing port… [+8514 chars]
